lob.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to throw something somewhere, especially over a wall, fence etc
lob.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: The kids were lobbing pine cones into the neighbor’s yard.
lob.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: to kick or hit a ball in a slow high curve, especially in a game of tennis or football
lob.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: Nadal lobbed the ball high over Murray’s head.
